The post How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Are you looking to exchange Payeer USD to PayPal effortlessly?
CoinCannon is here to help!
With 24/7 online support and no hidden fees, CoinCannon makes swapping your digital funds quick and easy.
In today’s digital world, relying on a single payment system just isn’t practical. We often need to use multiple services to meet various needs, each offering unique benefits. However, transferring funds between different wallets can be a real pain and can cost you a pretty penny.Fortunately, CoinCannon offers a fantastic solution to this problem.

In this article, we’ll walk you through the simple steps to exchange Payeer USD to PayPal without any hassle and zero hidden fees.

What Do I Need to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal?

For this transaction, you will be sending Payeer USD and Receiving PayPal in your desired currency. Naturally, you will need verified and active accounts for both Payeer and PayPal. Make sure that the exchange amount does not exceed your withdrawal and deposit limits on both accounts. As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email-address since no KYC (know your customer) is necessary. However, bear in mind that there are many advantages available for those who sign up on CoinCannon.

Exchanging Payeer USD for PayPal: 2024 New Rules and Updates

In 2024, there have been several updates and new rules that might affect the process of exchanging Payeer USD to PayPal. Here are the key points you need to know:

  1. PayPal Policy Updates:
    • Purchase Protection Program: Amendments to PayPal’s Purchase Protection Program became effective on May 20, 2024. These changes could impact how disputes and claims are handled when using PayPal.
    • Charities and Online Card Payment Services: There have been updates to the terms and conditions for PayPal Confirmed Charities and Online Card Payment Services, also effective from May 20, 2024.
  2. IRS Reporting Requirements:
    • Starting January 1, 2024, the IRS has implemented new reporting requirements for payments received for goods and services. The reporting threshold has been lowered to $600 USD for the 2024 tax season, down from the previous threshold of $20,000 USD and 200 transactions. This means that if you receive $600 USD or more in payments through PayPal, it will be reported to the IRS.
  3. Fee Structure Changes:
    • Effective April 17, 2024, PayPal has updated its fee structure. For example, the fees for Advanced Credit and Debit Card transactions have been revised. This could affect the overall cost of transactions when exchanging funds between Payeer and PayPal.
  4. Exchange Rates and Best Practices:
    • When exchanging Payeer USD to PayPal USD, it’s important to consider the exchange rates offered by different exchangers. Websites like BestChange.com provide a list of exchangers with the best rates at the top, along with reviews and reserves to help you make an informed decision.

By staying informed about these updates and following best practices, you can ensure a smooth and cost-effective exchange process between Payeer USD and PayPal in 2024.

How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal?

  • Select Payeer from the box on the left and PayPal on the right.
  • Enter the Payeer amount you want to exchange to PayPal and behold the most competitive exchange rates!
  • Before clicking “Next”, please read the instructions and “PayPal fees guide” carefully.
  •  By clicking “Next” and enter your PayPal details and your email address. Please note that we contact you using the email address you provide therefore it’s important that you enter a valid email address.
  • Once again, press Next, and you are taken to the next level where you are asked to review your order. Please click on Review and Check. Read and agree to the terms and AML policy.
  • By clicking on “Confirm” you are taken to the 4th and last step where you have to pay your order.
  • Make sure to copy your order’s track ID and then click on the “Confirm Payment” button. You will be taken to Payeer payment gateway where you can pay your order.
  • Once you completed the payment, you will be redirected to CoinCannon and will see a message confirming your payment.
  • Now just sit back and enjoy the money that soon will be in your PayPal account.

Success!

The Exchange process will start as soon as you finish the steps above, your order will be checked and the PayPal will be send to your account.

Viva La CoinCannon!

Of course, in order to exchange Payeer to PayPal, you will first need a reliable exchange platform. For that, CoinCannon is one of the best options out there.

Every exchange platform must maintain three important characteristics. Anonymity, affordability and reliability. We pride ourselves as a professional platform that offers all three.

For anonymity, CoinCannon requires no KYC or even a sign up process. The best way to protect your information is to not share them with anyone. And for that, we respect our customers and do not ask for their personal info.

As for affordability, CoinCannon utilizes an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. By doing so, we have managed to stay on top of the ranks on websites such as Bestchange and OkChanger.

jolixo usually takes care of your transaction in 1 hour but in some cases it might take up to 24 hours to complete your order. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

The post How to Exchange Payeer USD to PayPal [2024 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Exchange WebMoney to PayPal [2025 Update]
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
In the world of payment systems which emerged at the dawn of e-commerce, WebMoney and PayPal are two of the most popular. Each payment system is more common and widely accepted in different geographical areas. Such factor, makes WebMoney to PayPal exchange essential for some. Here at CoinCannon, we will help you make that happen […]

The post How to Exchange WebMoney to PayPal [2025 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
In the world of payment systems which emerged at the dawn of e-commerce, WebMoney and PayPal are two of the most popular. Each payment system is more common and widely accepted in different geographical areas. Such factor, makes WebMoney to PayPal exchange essential for some. Here at CoinCannon, we will help you make that happen so you can easily use the money you are keeping in your WebMoney account.

What is the difference between WebMoney and PayPal?

Both PayPal and WebMoney are e-wallets, but while Webmoney is more common in Russia, PayPal is a mainstream international e-wallet. There is a major difference between them, for instance, while PayPal does accept charge-back, Webmoney does not offer such a service. PayPal is focused on credit and debit cards, and those clients without such cards are not able to use PayPal services.

Why transfer Wmz to PayPal?

Exchanging WebMoney to PayPal can offer several benefits, depending on your needs and circumstances:

  1. Global Accessibility: PayPal is widely accepted across the globe, making it convenient for international transactions and online purchases. By exchanging WebMoney to PayPal, you gain access to a broader range of merchants and online services.
  2. Ease of Use: PayPal is known for its user-friendly interface and seamless payment process. Transferring funds between PayPal accounts is quick and straightforward, making it convenient for both personal and business transactions.
  3. Security: PayPal offers robust security measures to protect your financial information and transactions. With features like buyer and seller protection, encryption technology, and fraud monitoring, PayPal provides peace of mind when conducting online transactions.
  4. Integration: PayPal integrates with various e-commerce platforms, payment gateways, and online marketplaces, making it an ideal choice for businesses and freelancers. By exchanging WebMoney to PayPal, you can easily connect your payment methods to popular platforms like Shopify, WooCommerce, and eBay.
  5. Currency Conversion: PayPal supports multiple currencies, allowing you to exchange WebMoney to PayPal and convert funds into your preferred currency. This flexibility makes PayPal suitable for international transactions and currency conversion at competitive rates.

Overall, exchanging WebMoney to PayPal offers convenience, security, and global accessibility, making it a popular choice for individuals and businesses alike. Whether you’re shopping online, receiving payments, or managing your finances, PayPal provides a reliable platform for digital transactions.

How to exchange WebMoney to PayPal?

It was difficult to exchange WebMoney to PayPal in the past. Normally, you can’t just transfer the money in your WebMoney account to a PayPal account. In order to do so, you have to transfer your WebMoney holdings to a bank account which is connected to your PayPal and then use the money in your PayPal account. This process is not possible for everyone and is quite expensive in many cases.

You only have to go to the WebMoney for PayPal Exchange page and follow these directions:

Step 1: Select WebMoney from the box on the left and PayPal (USD/EUR/GBP) on the right.

Step 2 : Enter the amount you want to exchange to PayPal and get the most competitive exchange rates!

Step 3 : Click “Next” and enter your PayPal details and your valid email address.

Step 4 : Once again, Click on Next button, and you are taken to the next level where you are asked to review your order. Please click on Review and Check. Read and agree to the terms and AML policy.

Step 5: By clicking on “Confirm” you are taken to the 4th and last step where you have to pay your order.

At this stage we ask you to read the instruction carefully. Please do read them carefully!

Step 6: Make sure to copy your order’s track ID and then transfer the exchange amount to CoinCannon Webmoney Purse which is mentioned on this page. Don’t forget to mention your CoinCannon track ID when sending the WebMoney.

Step 7 : At this stage, please write your WebMoney purse address in the section dedicated to it and click on “Confirm Payment” button.

After you have successfully sent the amount, your order is done and we transfer the money to your PayPal account sooner than you can imagine.

By fulfilling all the steps above, your WebMoney to PayPal exchange will be performed quickly. You can also go directly to the landing page dedicated for Exchange WebMoney to PayPal for a quicker and smoother exchange.

In case of any questions and problems, you can always count on to our support through WhatsApp, Telegram, Email, Skype, Contact Form, and Live chat on the bottom right corner of the display.

Transfer WMZ to PayPal Now!

Tips to have a secure WebMoney Transfer

  1. Choose a Trusted Exchange Service: Select a reputable exchange platform with a proven track record of reliability and security. Research customer reviews and ratings to gauge the trustworthiness of the service provider before initiating the exchange.
  2. Verify SSL Encryption: Ensure that the exchange website uses SSL encryption to secure your data during the transaction. Look for “https://” at the beginning of the website URL and a padlock icon in the browser address bar to confirm the encryption.
  3. Check for Secure Payment Gateways: Verify that the exchange service uses secure payment gateways to process transactions. Payment gateways such as PayPal often have robust security measures in place to protect users’ financial information.
  4. Enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA): If the exchange platform offers two-factor authentication, enable it for an extra layer of security. 2FA adds an additional verification step, typically involving a code sent to your mobile device, which helps prevent unauthorized access to your account.
  5. Verify Transaction Details: Before confirming the exchange, carefully review the transaction details, including the exchange rate, fees, and recipient account information. Ensure that all information is accurate to avoid errors or potential fraud.
  6. Use Strong Passwords: Create strong, unique passwords for both your WebMoney and PayPal accounts to prevent unauthorized access. Avoid using easily guessable passwords and consider using a password manager to securely store and manage your passwords.
  7. Beware of Phishing Attempts: Be cautious of phishing attempts that mimic legitimate exchange websites or emails. Always access the exchange platform directly through a secure link and avoid clicking on suspicious links or providing sensitive information in unsolicited emails.
  8. Monitor Account Activity: Regularly monitor your WebMoney and PayPal accounts for any unauthorized or suspicious activity. Report any unusual transactions or signs of unauthorized access to the respective customer support teams immediately.
  9. Keep Software Updated: Ensure that your devices and software, including web browsers and security software, are up-to-date with the latest security patches and updates. Regular updates help protect against known vulnerabilities and security threats.

By following these tips, you can enhance the security of your exchange from WebMoney to PayPal and minimize the risk of unauthorized access, fraud, or other security breaches.

Why to Choose CoinCannon to Exchange Webmoney to Paypal

At CoinCannon, we’re dedicated to providing our users with a seamless and rewarding experience.

  • No Exchange Fees: We don’t charge you anything more than stated in the order details
  • 24/7 Online Support: Need support? We’re always there for you. Reach out to CoinCannon any time of the day
  • Hassle-Free KYC: At CoinCannon everything is fast and furious! No headache or extra steps to slow you down

Note that by signing up with us, you gain access to a range of exclusive benefits designed to enhance your trading journey:

  • With the ability to view your order history, you can track your transactions effortlessly and gain valuable insights into your trading patterns.
  • What’s more, our innovative affiliate program empowers you to earn money simply by sharing your unique referral link.
  • Every order made by those who register through your link contributes to your earnings, allowing you to maximize your profits effortlessly.
  • Plus, stay tuned for exciting updates as we introduce personal wallets and cashback options in the near future, further enriching your trading experience.

Join CoinCannon today and unlock a world of possibilities in the digital currency market!

The post How to Exchange WebMoney to PayPal [2025 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: What is PayPal Stablecoin? Here’s what we know so far
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
PayPal’s launch of PayPal USD, a U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin, is indeed a significant milestone for the company and the broader digital payments industry. This move demonstrates PayPal’s commitment to staying at the forefront of innovation and meeting the evolving needs of its customers. By offering a stablecoin payment option, PayPal is providing its users with […]

The post What is PayPal Stablecoin? Here’s what we know so far appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
PayPal’s launch of PayPal USD, a U.S. dollar-pegged stablecoin, is indeed a significant milestone for the company and the broader digital payments industry. This move demonstrates PayPal’s commitment to staying at the forefront of innovation and meeting the evolving needs of its customers.

Exchange PYUSD Now!

By offering a stablecoin payment option, PayPal is providing its users with increased convenience, efficiency, and security in their transactions. Stablecoins, backed by traditional currencies like the U.S. dollar, offer stability and eliminate the volatility often associated with cryptocurrencies. This feature makes stablecoins a reliable and attractive option for both individuals and businesses.

Furthermore, PayPal’s entry into the stablecoin market contributes to the mainstream adoption of digital currencies. PayPal’s endorsement of stablecoins brings further legitimacy and trust to the cryptocurrency ecosystem. 

CoinCannon is constantly committed to delivering the utmost quality to customers.

which is why we promptly incorporated PayPal  Stablecoin into our website shortly after its initial release. You can exchange  PayPal  Stablecoin easily on CoinCannon.

What is PYUSD?

The launch of PayPal USD aligns with the growing demand for digital payments and the increasing popularity of cryptocurrencies. By integrating stablecoins into its platform, PayPal is catering to the needs and preferences of its user base, providing them with more choices and flexibility in managing their finances.

Overall, PayPal’s introduction of PayPal USD is a commendable step towards embracing the future of finance and empowering individuals and businesses with secure and efficient digital payment options.

PayPal’s decision to fully back PayPal USD with U.S. dollar deposits, short-term Treasurys, and cash equivalents is a commendable approach that enhances the stability and reliability of the stablecoin.

This commitment to ensuring a 1-to-1 ratio between the stablecoin and the U.S. dollar.

demonstrates PayPal’s dedication to maintaining the trust and confidence of its users.

Partnering with Paxos Trust Company, a reputable fintech company specializing in blockchain, further strengthens the credibility and security of PayPal USD. This collaboration brings together the expertise of both companies, ensuring the seamless issuance and management of the stablecoin.

PayPal Stablecoin is Now Available 

PayPal’s president and CEO, acknowledges the need for a stable instrument that is digitally native and easily connected to fiat.

By introducing PayPal USD, PayPal is meeting this need and empowering individuals and businesses with a reliable and efficient means of conducting digital transactions.

While it is important to be aware of the risks associated with stablecoins and cryptocurrencies in general, PayPal USD offers consumers increased flexibility and payment options. The decentralized nature of stablecoins provides users with greater control over their finances, and the ability to transfer and exchange the stablecoin easily adds to its appeal.

It is crucial for potential investors to carefully consider their risk tolerance and conduct thorough research before investing in any financial asset, including stablecoins. However, PayPal’s commitment to stability, its partnership with a reputable company, and the benefits of increased flexibility and decentralization make PayPal USD an intriguing option for those looking to explore the world of digital currencies.

The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has been cracking down on crypto companies, including Paxos, the partner of PayPal in issuing the stablecoin. The SEC threatened to sue Paxos in February, claiming that their Binance USD coin was not a registered security. This crackdown is part of the SEC’s efforts to enforce federal investment laws and address potential risks posed by crypto assets to the financial system. The collapse of Luna and its stablecoin, TerraUSD, last year further accelerated the SEC’s enforcement actions.

Although the SEC has targeted several crypto firms in recent years, it has yet to establish a clear framework for defining and regulating stablecoins. In the case of Paxos, the SEC argued that Binance USD qualifies as a security due to its profit-earning potential as an investment contract. This differs from the agency’s classification of Terra as an algorithmic stablecoin without investment backing.

Stablecoins are cryptocurrencies that are pegged to the value of another financial instrument, often a currency or commodity, and can be used for payments. The most prominent U.S. dollar-backed stablecoins include TetherUSD, USD Coin, and Binance USD.

What are potential use cases and benefits of PYUSD

The potential uses and benefits of a truly decentralized U.S. dollar stablecoin are significant for the average consumer. It would provide a borderless and potentially uncensorable version of the world’s reserve currency, enabling people in countries excluded from traditional U.S. payment rails to transact with ease. 

However, the introduction of PYUSD by PayPal through Venmo seems to limit its utility to banked Americans who already have access to digital representations of the U.S. dollar through PayPal’s existing products. Although PYUSD may be sent outside of PayPal’s ecosystem via the Ethereum network, it is unlikely that PayPal would allow this, as the stablecoin is not truly decentralized.

Benefits of PYUSD

Nevertheless, if individuals who are banned from using Venmo or PayPal in the United States find a way to withdraw their funds via PYUSD on the Ethereum network, it could potentially benefit both PayPal and the consumers with frozen funds. However, this scenario is speculative, and the actual use cases and benefits of PYUSD are more likely to be exploited and utilized by financial institutions rather than directly impacting the average consumer.

Once the transaction gets confirmed on the blockchain network, Your cryptocurrency to PayPal stablecoin  exchange will be completed easily and automatically without any waiting period by fulfilling the easy steps that we explained.

You can always count on us. In case of any questions and problems, you can contact our 24/7 support via Email and Live Chat. We always get back to you ASAP!

The post What is PayPal Stablecoin? Here’s what we know so far appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

The nature of Cryptocurrency is to stay anonymous whenever you want. Plus, those procedures known as Know Your Customer is not always easy to complete when in an emergency. Decentralized […]

The post How to Exchange Bitcoin to PayPal [2023 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
How to exchange your bitcoins to PayPal with all the KYC problems that normal Crypto Exchanges make for Bitcoin users, has always been a hassle. The nature of Cryptocurrency is to stay anonymous whenever you want. Plus, those procedures known as Know Your Customer is not always easy to complete when in an emergency. Decentralized exchanges like CoinCannon on the other hand have made the process of exchanging your crypto assets a much easier process just like the way you can exchange Bitcoin to PayPal on CoinCannon. Actually not just easier but also more efficient as most of the time you get exactly 1$ or even more for every 1$ worth of your bitcoin.

Exchange BTC to PayPal Now!

PayPal is an online banking service that enables you to use a protected internet account to pay for goods and services. Any money earned stays in your PayPal account and can be used with the balance topped up by your allocated cards or bank account when paying for things.

Jump to How to Exchange BTC to PayPal step by step guide

For Bitcoin users, however, this service can make the Bitcoin to Cash process much faster. let’s be realistic, you can’t find many stores out there who accept Bitcoin as a payment method yet. So, it’s better to have the option to use our BTC in a from of money more widely accepted whenever we need them. This is when knowing how to exchange your BTC to PayPal comes handy!
In this article, we will explain how to exchange Bitcoin to PayPal instantly and get the exact market value of your cryptocurrency in your PayPal account.

What is Bitcoin and How does it work?

This might still be a question to many, before reading about how to exchange, one must know where Bitcoins come from. Bitcoin is a digital currency that was developed following the housing market crash in January 2009. This cryptocurrency follows the ideas started out by the pseudonymous and mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto in a whitepaper. The identity of the individual or individuals that developed the software is still a mystery. Unlike government-issued currencies, Bitcoin is operated by a decentralized authority and offers the promise of lower transaction fees than traditional online payment mechanisms.

There are no physical Bitcoins and the coins you see are novelty coins that do not have any real value without the code inscribed on them. Bitcoin is only balances retained on a public ledger that everyone has transparent access to, and is verified by a massive amount of computing power along with all Bitcoin transactions. Bitcoins are not issued or supported as a commodity by any banks or governments, nor are individual bitcoins valuable. Although it is not legal tender, the popularity of Bitcoin charts is high, and hundreds of other virtual currencies collectively referred to as Altcoins have been launched following this cryptocurrency.

Can I exchange Bitcoin to PayPal?

Yes, you can get US Dollar, Pounds or Euros in your PayPal account in exchange for your cryptocurrencies at most of the exchanges. But are all of them as fast as CoinCannon? you’ll know the moment you check the process and rates.

Conducted through trustworthy exchange agents – such as jolixo with 24/7 support and immediate exchange without any waiting period- you can exchange Bitcoins for PayPal or any other currency of your choice. This process means immediate cash with the least commission possible, without having to go through the time-consuming process of crypto exchanges. 

Below, you can read the step by step guide on how to exchange BTC to PayPal through CoinCannon in a very simple procedure.

How to get the best value of my Bitcoins in PayPal?

You just have to type hi.exchange in your address bar. And NO! Although there’s a Sign Up button on this page, you don’t need to sign up for performing any sort of exchange at our website. But if you do, you’ll enjoy the following features:

  • Order log that you can check and track at any moment
  • The privilege of entering a referral program that helps you to gain money by referring your fellow traders to hi.exchange
  • Based on your activities, discounts on future orders
  • News on sales and discounts

Therefore, if you’re willing to carry out your exchange using CoinCannon, just go the Bitcoin to PayPal exchange page and follow the following steps in order:

  1. Select Bitcoin from the box on the left and PayPal on the right
  2. Enter the BTC amount you want to exchange to PayPal and behold the most competitive exchange rates!
  3. Before clicking “Next”, please read the instructions and “PayPal fees guide” carefully
  4.  By clicking “Next” and enter your PayPal details and your email address. Please note that we contact you using the email address you provide therefore it’s important that you enter a valid email address
  5. Once again, press Next, and you are taken to the next level where you are asked to review your order. Please click on Review and Check. Read and agree to the terms and AML policy.
  6. By clicking on “Confirm” you are taken to the 4th and last step where you have to pay your order
  7. Obtain a tracking ID, an address, and an Explorer URL
  8. At this stage we ask you to read the instruction carefully. Please do read them carefully!
  9. Transfer your crypto to the Hi Exchange wallet provided to you
  10. Click on the “Confirm Payment” button, sit back and enjoy the money that soon will be in your PayPal account

There are some points worth mentioning regarding your BTC cash out:

  • You can request for PayPal USD, EUR or GBP from “I Get” section of the first Step. After you typed the BTC amount in the “I Give” section, in a blink of an eye, the automated system calculates how much you’ll receive in your PayPal account for your Bitcoins. The rate is pretty amazing, right? don’t worry we’re not going to go bankrupt.
  • You receive a tracking ID, an address, and Explorer URL. You can follow your order using those information or request support from customer service
  • You should transfer the Bitcoins needs to the wallet specified in the last step
  • Please read the instructions and disclaimer carefully before sending the bitcoins
  • Don’t forget clicking “I’ve Paid” button after you have transferred the BTC to out wallet

Once the transaction gets confirmed on blockchain network, Your Bitcoin to PayPal exchange will be completed easily and automatically without any waiting period by fulfilling the easy steps that we explained.

You can always count on us. In case of any questions and problems, you can contact us via WhatsApp, Telegram, Facebook, Email, Skype, Contact Form, and Live Chat. We get back to you ASAP!

The post How to Exchange Bitcoin to PayPal [2023 Update] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: Binance Exchange Under Investigation by DOJ
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
The Justice Department is investigating Binance Holdings, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange. Primarily, this is to determine whether it violated economic sanctions imposed on Russia. According to Bloomberg, the probe is examining whether the exchange or its employees breached the sanctions put in place due to Moscow’s military actions in Ukraine. Despite the allegations, Binance […]

The post Binance Exchange Under Investigation by DOJ appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
The Justice Department is investigating Binance Holdings, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange. Primarily, this is to determine whether it violated economic sanctions imposed on Russia. According to Bloomberg, the probe is examining whether the exchange or its employees breached the sanctions put in place due to Moscow’s military actions in Ukraine. Despite the allegations, Binance insists that it follows all US and international sanctions. On the other hand, the Russian authorities have made official statements on how they have planned to curb sanctions using cryptocurrencies.

Binance Exchange and Compliance with Sanctions

Binance claims that it has implemented an initiative to revamp its corporate governance structure and transform its global operations. The exchange also states that it has a know-your-customer (KYC) process that rivals that of traditional banking systems. Its KYC process includes a mandatory disclosure of residence and personal identification checks. The company takes a zero-tolerance approach to double registrations, anonymous identities, and obscure sources of funds.

“In 2021, Binance launched an initiative to completely overhaul its corporate governance structure, including bringing in a world-class bench of seasoned executives to fundamentally change how Binance operates globally.”

Back in 2021, Binance pledged to abide by EU’s ruling on Russian sanctions. Despite that, the Justice Department will not make baseless accusations on such critical matters. For the most part, it would be interesting to see what evidence the DOJ holds on Binance exchange.

Based on the report, the investigation is looking into whether the exchange or some of its employees helped Russia with supplying money for their operations in Ukraine. This is according to five anonymous sources.

Binance’s Struggles with Regulators

Binance has faced numerous allegations from US regulators and authorities in recent years. Although many of the claims were unsubstantiated, the exchange has been under scrutiny. Earlier this year, anti-crypto Senator Elizabeth Warren and other officials wrote an open letter to Binance asking for various information from the firm. They alleged that the exchange was facilitating illicit activity by intentionally concealing its activities.

Binance exchange responded to the claims made by the senators, stating that most of the information was taken from inaccurate media reports. The exchange denies allegations of violating sanctions against Russia and insists that it adheres to all US and international sanctions. Binance has taken steps to address compliance concerns by revamping its corporate governance structure and enhancing its KYC process.

Walking a Thin Line…

Being the world’s largest crypto exchange certainly has its own baggage. Back in 2021, Changpeng Zhao, the CEO of Binance exchange revealed one of the largest Ponzi schemes in the history of crypto. Essentially, Changpeng Zhao went to war with Sam Bankman-Fried and dumped all their FTX token holdings. Within a matter of days, the FTX collapsed and a vast majority of investors lost their assets overnight. Soon after the collapse, countless sources revealed how SBF had strong ties with the US democratic party.

Subsequently, Binance exchange has found itself in the middle of a political war. With that, it is only natural for the regulators to probe into their operations and look for something. Now, while Changpeng Zhao revealed a true scam operation, it doesn’t mean that Binance is without fault. Considering the scale of their operations, one can safely assume that they have certainly slipped more than a few times.

And in case of Russian sanctions and all the crimes against humanity charges on Russian authorities, even a small proof that they helped Russia with their sanctions can have devastating repercussions for Binance exchange. But that’s not all.

In case the investigation manages to convict Binance, we could expect even more restrictive crypto regulations.  While Changpeng Zhao shrugs off the serious charges against them as simply “FUD”, Binance exchange is facing life or death situation as the lawsuits against them keep stacking up.

The post Binance Exchange Under Investigation by DOJ appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.title: How to Exchange Dogecoin to Tether [Instantly]

Despite all the huge growth in short periods of time, Dogecoin remains as a highly volatile crypto asset. In that regard, most investors tend to convert DOGE […]

The post How to Exchange Dogecoin to Tether [Instantly] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
Looking for the best platform to exchange Dogecoin to Tether? CoinCannon is all you need. For the past two years, DOGE has been a hot topic of conversation. Despite all the huge growth in short periods of time, Dogecoin remains as a highly volatile crypto asset. In that regard, most investors tend to convert DOGE to Tether USDT in case they’re looking to hold assets for a while. However, it’s not easy to find an anonymous exchange platform that offers low exchange fees. In this article, we will go over everything you need to know on how to exchange Dogecoin to Tether USDT.

So, get started! Head over to jolixo, select Dogecoin and Tether on the box and you’re good to go.

What Do I Need to Exchange Dogecoin to Tether?

For this exchange, you will need a crypto wallet to receive USDT. Most likely, your Dogecoin wallet supports USDT, so you can also receive funds in the same wallet. Make sure that you are using a reliable crypto wallet to hold your assets. On the other hand, for CoinCannon platform, all you need is an email address. CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or sign up. However, there are benefits and rewards for those who sign up on CoinCannon. How do you like winning $100 gifts ever single month?

What is Dogecoin (DOGE)?

Dogecoin started off as somewhat of a joke, but it developed a following after it was created. By the end of 2017, Dogecoin was a part of the cryptocurrency bubble that sent up the prices of several coins dramatically. Dogecoin lost much of its value after the bubble burst in 2018, but it still has a core of supporters who trade it and use it to tip Twitter and Reddit content.

Dogecoin (DOGE) is an open-source, peer-to-peer cryptocurrency. It is called an altcoin and as mentioned, many believe it is an almost sarcastic meme coin. Although it was seemingly developed as a joke, the blockchain of Dogecoin still has value. It derives its underlying technology from Litecoin. The low price and infinite supply of Dogecoin are noteworthy features of this cryptocurrency, which uses a scrypt algorithm.

You can read more about What is Dogecoin at our article fully dedicated to this Cryptocurrency in case you need to do your research about this coin.

Why Exchange Dogecoin to Tether?

At this point, it’s good to briefly introduce Tether. Tether is a cryptocurrency based on blockchain whose crypto coins in use are backed by an equivalent amount of traditional fiat currencies, such as the Dollar, Euro, or Japanese Yen that is retained in a specific bank account. The Tether tokens, the Tether network’s native tokens, trade under the USDT symbol.

In contrast to the wide swings observed in the prices of other popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, Tether belongs to a new race of cryptocurrencies called stablecoins that aims to keep cryptocurrency valuations stable. Instead of being used as a means of speculative investment, this would allow Tether to be used as a medium of exchange and a mode of storage of value.

Tether was specifically developed to create the necessary CoinCannon between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies, providing users with stability, transparency, and minimum transaction fees. It is pegged against the US dollar and, in terms of value, maintains a 1-to-1 ratio with USD. There is, however, no guarantee provided by Tether Ltd. for any right to redeem or exchange real money for Tethers, i.e. Tethers cannot be exchanged for U.S. Dollars.

CoinCannon Platform

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange Dogecoin to Tether?

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Dogecoin (DOGE) on the left field and Tether USDT on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your USDT wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your DOGE to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you. Then, make sure to upload a screenshot of the payment.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Done!

In that regard, users will find themselves in the need to exchange their assets into one another. And […]

item.content:encoded:
Looking to exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin? CoinCannon offers everything you need! Digital currencies have been a quintessential asset for online payments. On top of that, cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC) are gaining momentum as popular payment methods. In that regard, users will find themselves in the need to exchange their assets into one another. And by doing so, the exchange fees can quickly put a dent in their pockets. Fortunately, you can easily exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin with the lowest fees, full anonymity and 24/7 online support. Want to know how?

Head over to jolixo, select AdvCash and Bitcoin in the exchange box and you’re good to go!

What Do I Need to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin?

For this exchange, you will need a verified and active Advanced Cash (AdvCash) account. Make sure that the transaction amount does not exceed your withdrawal limit. To receive Bitcoin (BTC), you will need a reliable and secure crypto wallet. Primarily, we suggest you use Trust Wallet. As for CoinCannon, all you need is an email address. CoinCannon provides a hassle-free KYC process and no sign up to speed up your work flow. Despite that, there are benefits for those who sign up on CoinCannon. For example, you can take advantage of CoinCannon affiliate program and earn money online.

What is Advanced Cash (AdvCash)?

Before we go on to talk about how to convert AdvCash to Bitcoin, let’s take a quick look at what this digital currency is. AdvCash is a currency used for online payments. It is based in Belize which provides immunity from national laws of other countries for it. As an offshore currency, it is also encrypted much like cryptocurrencies and benefits from better anonymity and security. The Advance Cash company provides an account for users that allows for a variety of currencies to operate through it. In many ways, it is a lot like Payeer.

And much like Payeer, AdvCash supports transfers in both fiat and cryptocurrency form. With a virtual wallet, users can transfer funds and make payments with very low commission. What makes it interesting, is that Advance Cash is also compatible with other payment systems such as WebMoney or Perfect Money. With free international transfers, users get to enjoy a wide variety of currencies all in a virtual wallet. Furthermore, there are both physical and virtual bank cards available for quick and cheap international Visa/Mastercard payments.

The company was founded in 2014 as a competitor for PayPal and much like its peers, it has gained notable success in the past few years. As the need for virtual banking grows, online payment processing companies continue to narrow the gap with PayPal. Although, such companies are not as popular as PayPal, they offer a lot more freedom.

Keep in mind that you can also Exchange AdvCash to PayPal.

Why Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin?

Bitcoin is a digital currency that was developed following the housing market crash in January 2009. This cryptocurrency follows the ideas started out by the pseudonymous and mysterious Satoshi Nakamoto in a whitepaper. The identity of the individual or individuals that developed the software is still a mystery. Unlike government-issued currencies, Bitcoin is operated by a decentralized authority and offers the promise of lower transaction fees than traditional online payment mechanisms.

There are no physical Bitcoins and the coins you see are novelty coins that do not have any real value without the code inscribed on them. Bitcoin is only balances retained on a public ledger that everyone has transparent access to, and is verified by a massive amount of computing power along with all Bitcoin transactions. Bitcoins are not issued or supported as a commodity by any banks or governments, nor are individual bitcoins valuable. Although it is not legal tender, the popularity of Bitcoin charts is high, and hundreds of other virtual currencies collectively referred to as Altcoins have been launched following this cryptocurrency.

CoinCannon Platform

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the perfect online exchange. CoinCannon is here to offer you everything you need and more. With a combination of anonymity, unbeatable exchange rates, and reliability, it’s a platform like no other.

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

Looking for the best exchange rates? CoinCannon is right there for you. Our platform uses an automated system to ensure that you always get the best value for your trades. Don’t just take our word for it, visit ranking websites like BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange AdvCash to Bitcoin?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select AdvCash USD and Bitcoin from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, the amount of BTC you will receive will automatically calculate.
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your AdvCash and Payeer wallet details and email. The phone number is optional.
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the AdvCash gateway and make the payment to our AdvCash account. Having transferred your AdvCash USD to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team will send the Bitcoin to your wallet as soon as possible

Done!

Just like that, you have now converted AdvCash to BTC. In general, WMZ payments are inconsistent in terms of how long they might take. Give it a few minutes and the AdvCash USD will be in your account ASAP. In the meantime, you can follow up on your order using the Track ID provided for you. Simply enter the track id in the required section on homepage to see at which point your order is. Remember not to share your Track ID with anyone else.

item.title: The US Banking Crisis: The Role of Crypto
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
The role of cryptocurrency in the failures of banks Silvergate, Silicon Valley, and Signature has been highlighted in a recent report by the Congressional Research Service (CRS). The report examines the impact of crypto on the US banking crisis and reveals that the banks’ exposure to crypto was minimal, but the perception of risk “may […]

The post The US Banking Crisis: The Role of Crypto appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
The role of cryptocurrency in the failures of banks Silvergate, Silicon Valley, and Signature has been highlighted in a recent report by the Congressional Research Service (CRS). The report examines the impact of crypto on the US banking crisis and reveals that the banks’ exposure to crypto was minimal, but the perception of risk “may have driven non-crypto firms/individuals to make significant withdrawals.” Interestingly, the statement sheds light on a critical issue regarding crypto assets. Despite all the bullish predictions, the failure of crypto-friendly banks outlines the severe lack of trust in crypto still dominant among retail investors.

Learn How to Exchange Cryptocurrency to PayPal

Limited Exposure to Crypto

According to analyst Paul Tierno from CRS, the banks’ exposure to crypto “was somewhat limited.” Tierno noted that “volatility in crypto markets may expose banks to liquidity risks that could ultimately lead to fatal losses.” However, it was the dwindling deposits from crypto firms that led banks to sell securities at a loss, exacerbating liquidity issues and solvency.

In November 2021, the crypto market reached an all-time high of around $3 trillion. However, by December 2022, the market lost more than two-thirds of its market capitalization. The report highlighted that the fall in digital asset prices led to centralized crypto platforms and stablecoin issuers experiencing redemptions, causing them to draw down deposits held at these banks.

To meet the withdrawal demand, banks sold securities for losses, affecting their liquidity and, in some cases, solvency. For instance, Silvergate’s deposits fell by over half, while Signature’s deposits dropped by 15% in Q4 2022. The CRS report emphasized that the losses were not realized on crypto-related assets but were caused by crypto deposit withdrawals.

Crypto’s Impact on US Banking Crisis

The CRS report reminds us that the crypto market chaos affected US bank stocks. SVB, Silvergate, and Signature were pushed over the edge by fear, uncertainty, and doubt. The report concluded that “banks must be prepared for the potential of rapid withdrawal of deposits. This can exacerbate liquidity issues and, ultimately, threaten solvency.”

In conclusion, the CRS report serves as a reminder that the crypto market’s volatility can impact US banks. Although the banks’ exposure to crypto was limited, the perception of risk was enough to drive non-crypto firms/individuals to make significant withdrawals, leading to the banks selling securities at a loss. This affected their liquidity and, in some cases, their solvency.

However, it’s also important to analyze the fear and the lack of trust in crypto. Perhaps, the volatility is the key factor here. Yet, the FTX collapse, may have been a big wake up call for investors. Portraying how easy it is to run a multi-billion dollar scam, Sam Bankman-Fried may have permanently stained the face of crypto. considering this congressional report, we can see how limited exposure to crypto can have negative effects on their business. With all that in mind, we can see how banks may be hesitant to integrate crypto asset into their systems.

The post The US Banking Crisis: The Role of Crypto appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:
If you are looking to exchange Payeer USD to cryptocurrencies or digital currencies, you might want to read how to exchange Payeer to PayPal first. Don’t forget you can always exchange Payeer to cryptocurrency or other currencies here at CoinCannon. the transaction and requirements might be a bit confusing. Luckily, this post will provide a step-by step guide on how to send Payeer USD to another wallet. Furthermore, you will learn how to find your account number and operation id.

How to Exchange Payeer USD

To begin with, you must first enter your Payeer account. As you log in, you are directed to the Dashboard. From there, you can navigate to different menus.

For this article, we demonstrate how to make a transaction. In order to make the payment, click on the “Transfer” menu on the left sidebar menu.

On the Transfer page, type the destination account number, remember that if it is a Payeer account, the number will start with the letter “P”. Following that, type the desired amount you want to transfer. To finish the transfer, simply click on “Send” button.

If you are new to Payeer, you can learn all about the platform on “What is Payeer” article.

Payeer Account Number

To exchange Payeer USD, you need to give the exchange platform your account number so that they can transfer funds to your account. To find account number, simply click on the account menu on the top-right. The account number and other information will appear and you can easily copy the number.

Payeer Operation ID

The operation id is a dedicated identification code that holds the transfer information for a transaction. To exchange Payeer USD on any platform, you will need this id to prove your payment firs. The operation id is simple to find. To do so, first click on the “History” on the left sidebar.

In the page that appears, you can see all your previous transaction. For the specific transaction, click on the ID. By clicking on the ID, information about the transaction will appear and you can see the operation id. Simply copy it and use it on the exchange platform.

Exchange Payeer USD on CoinCannon

jolixo is a decentralized online platform to exchange your cryptocurrencies and e-currencies. We utilize an automated system to determine the best exchange rates at any moment. Furthermore, CoinCannon does not require complex KYC or a sign-up process. Backed by 24/7 customer support, our great reviews on Bestchange and Trustpilot is a testament of our good will. You can easily swap Payeer to PayPal or other Digital currencies or CRyptocurrencies on CoinCannon.

For more instructional content, you can always visit CoinCannon Blog

The post Exchange Payeer USD to Other Currencies [Step-by-Step] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.

item.content:encoded:
Looking for an easy way to exchange Litecoin to Tether with full anonymity? CoinCannon is all you need. Litecoin is one of the oldest altcoins in the crypto space and has strong group of loyal investors. In terms of utility, a vast number of online platforms support LTC transactions as payment. With that, investors can not only hold LTC for investment, but they can also use it for payments. However, if you want to stay safe from volatility, you will need to exchange LTC. For that, it’s not easy to find an exchange platform that offers low exchange fees and privacy simultaneously. Fortunately, we will introduce the ultimate OTC exchange platform in this article and provide a step-by-step guide on how to exchange Litecoin to Tether.

So get started, head over to jolixo, select Litecoin and Tether and you’re good to go.

What Do I Need to Exchange Litecoin to Tether?

For this exchange, you will need a crypto wallet to receive USDT. Most likely, your Litecoin wallet supports USDT, so you can also receive funds in the same wallet. Make sure that you are using a reliable crypto wallet to hold your assets. On the other hand, for CoinCannon platform, all you need is an email address. CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or sign up. However, there are benefits and rewards for those who sign up on CoinCannon. How do you like winning $100 gifts ever single month?

What is Litecoin (LTC)?

Litecoin was one of the earliest Bitcoin spinoffs back in 2011. Generally speaking, Litecoin bears resemblance to Bitcoin in many ways. It is essentially a global payment network that is autonomous and open-source. The decentralized network does not allow a central authority to take control over the payments. LTC is the native currency of this network which is the medium for all transactions within the network. Litecoin utilizes a proof of work (POW) blockchain network meaning that there are active miners working for it.

So far, it looks to be Another Bitcoin impersonator. However, the LTC network uses a different cryptographic algorithm called scrypt. Furthermore, it provides much faster block generation speeds and subsequently much better scalability.

As of April 2023, LTC is 12th cryptocurrency in the ranks with a market cap of over $6.5 billion. To learn everything about the network and its cryptocurrency continue reading “What is Litecoin?”

Why Exchange Litecoin to Tether?

At this point, it’s good to briefly introduce Tether. Tether is a cryptocurrency based on blockchain whose crypto coins in use are backed by an equivalent amount of traditional fiat currencies, such as the Dollar, Euro, or Japanese Yen that is retained in a specific bank account. The Tether tokens, the Tether network’s native tokens, trade under the USDT symbol.

In contrast to the wide swings observed in the prices of other popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, Tether belongs to a new race of cryptocurrencies called stablecoins that aims to keep cryptocurrency valuations stable. Instead of being used as a means of speculative investment, this would allow Tether to be used as a medium of exchange and a mode of storage of value.

Tether was specifically developed to create the necessary CoinCannon between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies, providing users with stability, transparency, and minimum transaction fees. It is pegged against the US dollar and, in terms of value, maintains a 1-to-1 ratio with USD. There is, however, no guarantee provided by Tether Ltd. for any right to redeem or exchange real money for Tethers, i.e. Tethers cannot be exchanged for U.S. Dollars.

CoinCannon Platform

Say goodbye to the hassle of searching for the perfect online exchange. CoinCannon is here to offer you everything you need and more. With a combination of anonymity, unbeatable exchange rates, and reliability, it’s a platform like no other.

At CoinCannon, your privacy is our top priority. We understand the importance of keeping personal information safe, and that’s why we don’t require it from our customers. With no KYC or sign-up required, you can trade confidently and securely.

Looking for the best exchange rates? CoinCannon is right there for you. Our platform uses an automated system to ensure that you always get the best value for your trades. Don’t just take our word for it, visit ranking websites like BestChange and OkChanger and see for yourself.

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange Litecoin to Tether?

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Litecoin (LTC) on the left field and Tether USDT on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your USDT wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your LTC to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you. Then, make sure to upload a screenshot of the payment.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

You’re all Set!

When you finish the steps above, our team will process your order and send the Tether USDT to your wallet address. The transaction may take a few minutes. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

item.content:encoded:
Looking for an easy way to exchange Ripple to Tether with anonymity? CoinCannon is all you need. Ripple (XRP) has been one of the most popular investment options for crypto enthusiasts. The blockchain network offers great utility for cross border transactions and an alternative payment system for traditional banking. On top of that, XRP has had great returns for investors as a native token for this innovative network. In this article, we will go over how to exchange Ripple to Tether without compromising on exchange rates or privacy.

So get started, head over to jolixo, select Ripple (XRP) on the left box and Tether (USDT) on the right one and you’re good to go!

What Do I Need to Exchange Ripple to Tether?

 For this exchange, you will need a crypto wallet to receive USDT. Most likely, your Cardano wallet supports USDT, so you can also receive funds in the same wallet. Make sure that you are using a reliable crypto wallet to hold your assets. On the other hand, for CoinCannon platform, all you need is an email address. CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or sign up. However, there are benefits and rewards for those who sign up on CoinCannon. How do you like winning $100 gifts ever single month?

What is Ripple (XRP)?

To put it simply, Ripple is a payment protocol designed to operate as a digital bank. However, by utilizing a decentralized blockchain network as the financial platform it can operate much more efficiently. As compared with a bank, Ripple network has significantly lower transaction fees and god-like scalability! This allows for seamless digital money transfers that are inexpensive and quick. This is especially important since institutions can save millions of dollars and long hours on their large transactions.

As the native token of the network, XRP basically acts as a mediator. All the funds deposited on the network will automatically convert to XRP and then converted back to the target currency. This clever design provides massive circulation for the cryptocurrency. To make it an even better deal, all XRP coins are pre-mined. Meaning that it is environmentally friendly and maintains very low gas fees.

As of April 2023, XRP is the 6th cryptocurrency with a market cap of almost $23.7 billion.

To learn everything about Ripple XRP continue reading “What is Ripple and How it Works?”.

Why Exchange Ripple to Tether (USDT)?

At this point, it’s good to briefly introduce Tether. Tether is a cryptocurrency based on blockchain whose crypto coins in use are backed by an equivalent amount of traditional fiat currencies, such as the Dollar, Euro, or Japanese Yen that is retained in a specific bank account. The Tether tokens, the Tether network’s native tokens, trade under the USDT symbol.

In contrast to the wide swings observed in the prices of other popular cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum, Tether belongs to a new race of cryptocurrencies called stablecoins that aims to keep cryptocurrency valuations stable. Instead of being used as a means of speculative investment, this would allow Tether to be used as a medium of exchange and a mode of storage of value.

Tether was specifically developed to create the necessary CoinCannon between fiat currencies and cryptocurrencies, providing users with stability, transparency, and minimum transaction fees. It is pegged against the US dollar and, in terms of value, maintains a 1-to-1 ratio with USD. There is, however, no guarantee provided by Tether Ltd. for any right to redeem or exchange real money for Tethers, i.e. Tethers cannot be exchanged for U.S. Dollars.

CoinCannon to the Moon!

We believe in being proactive and keeping ahead of any potential problems. That’s why we offer 24/7 customer support. No matter the issue, our team is always here to help. So go ahead, make your trades with peace of mind knowing that CoinCannon has got your back.

How to Exchange Ripple to Tether (USDT)

  1. Enter the Homepage on CoinCannon. Select Ripple (XRP) on the left field and Tether USDT on the right one. Enter the exchange amount and wait for the rates to apply.
  2. Click on Exchange and you will be forwarded to the next step where you will need to enter your USDT wallet address, email, and phone number (optional).
  3. Click on “Exchange” one more time as you go to the next page to review your order.
  4. At this point, you will obtain your Tracking ID, an address and an explorer URL.
  5. On this step, please dedicate some time to review our terms and conditions and the instructions.
  6. Transfer your XRP to the CoinCannon wallet address that is provided for you. Then, make sure to upload a screenshot of the payment.
  7. Finally, click on the “I’ve paid” button.

Finished!

When you finish the steps above, our team will process your order and send the Tether USDT to your wallet address. The transaction may take a few minutes. In the meantime, you will have a track id to follow up on your order. Simply enter the main page and type in your track id in the specified field to see your live order status. Keep in mind that your track id is private information and you should not share it with anyone else.

item.dc:creator: Admin
item.description:
In Boomer terms, a Perfect Money E-Voucher is basically like a bank check but digital. Thankfully, these vouchers are instantly redeemable via a code and a pin which could easily be […]

The post How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher [Including Video] appeared first on CoinCannon Blog.
item.content:encoded:
In Boomer terms, a Perfect Money E-Voucher is basically like a bank check but digital. Basically, users can create a Perfect Money E-Voucher with a certain value and use it as a redeemable transaction for a variety of purposes. Thankfully, these vouchers are instantly redeemable via a code and a pin which could easily be sent via SMS, E-mail or any form of online messaging. In terms of use cases, the applications are endless since it is an accessible form of payment for both the sender and the receiver. In this article, we will go through everything you need to know about the Perfect Money E-Voucher and how to make one instantly.

Buy Perfect Money Voucher Now!

Perfect Money E-Voucher

it is easy, it is affordable and it is anonymous a lot like the CoinCannon Platform! The E-Voucher is the solution to some of our biggest payment problems. The electronic voucher is a method of payment that is redeemable instantly. The user pays a specific amount of funds and creates a voucher. Then, the information for the voucher can easily be delivered to the receiver and they will have the choice to redeem the payment anytime they want. Much like a gift card or a bank check, the voucher will hold the value permanently since the payment has already been made.

Although there are numerous applications for this, here are some of the common utilities:

  • You can create a voucher to make payments when you don’t have access to your Perfect Money account.
  • Perfect Money E-Voucher is a good method of payment when you don’t carry cash or traveling abroad.
  • As a service provider, users can receive vouchers if they don’t wish to reveal their account address.
  • Send your loved ones a voucher instead of a gift card

Perfect Money E-Voucher does not cost users a lot of money to make! You can simply go to CoinCannon and create your voucher immediately with the lowest fees. On top of that, unlike a majority of exchanges, CoinCannon does not require KYC (know your customer) or even a sign up process. It is truly fast and truly anonymous.

What is Perfect Money?

Perfect Money is an e-currency for making payments on the internet. It is widely accepted as payment option by countless platforms. With Perfect Money, you can do a lot! Be it transferring funds to others or pay for goods and services. Or how about buying cryptocurrencies or even buying fiat currencies. It is a seriously popular payment method for online users. An additional capability is to loan and receipt issuance throughout the system.

The biggest downside of Perfect Money, however, is that you cannot cash Perfect money to your bank account on its website directly. For that, you will need a platform like CoinCannon to exchange your Perfect Money to PayPal and other e-currencies.

CoinCannon Does It Better!

Essentially, you need three primary qualities in an ideal exchange platform. Anonymity, good rates and reliability. The CoinCannon team consists of traders and professionals who have felt the need for an ideal exchange and pursued their vision.

First and foremost, all users need to protect their personal information especially when it comes down to financial transactions. Unfortunately, a vast majority of exchange apps and platforms make massive profits off of selling user data. Best case scenario, they are legally bound to disclose user information with national authorities for any reason. In that regard, the best method to protect your privacy is to not disclose them with anyone at all. CoinCannon does not require customers to go through KYC (know your customer) or even a mandatory sign up. In that regard, it is simply as safe as one can get making an exchange.

On the other hand, privacy is not a reason to pay more on your exchange. With that in mind, the platform offers some of the most competitive exchange rates you can find anywhere. Don’t take our word for it. You can simply pay a visit to ranking websites such as BestChange or OkChanger and see compare our rates with others.

Last but not least, not everything goes as planned in the digital world. Subsequently, the platform provides true online 24/7 customer support for the users.

How to Create Perfect Money E-Voucher?

  1. Enter the homepage first, then select Perfect Money and Perfect Money E-Voucher from the options in the first step. Enter the amount you want to exchange. Following that, you will see how much USD will be in your E-Voucher
  2. Press Exchange and you will go to the next stage where you will enter your E-mail address and phone number (it’s optional).
  3. One more time, click on the “Exchange” button and you will go to the next step where you will review your order.
  4. Complete the captcha and click on exchange to go to the next step where you will obtain a tracking ID. Press the “Pay Order” button to go to the Perfect Money gateway and make the payment to our Perfect Money account. Having transferred your Perfect Money to CoinCannon, your order will process very quickly.
  5. By finishing all the steps above, our team of professionals will create your e-voucher and send the details to you via E-mail.

Keep in mind, you can also see your E-Voucher information in Admin description section after that your order completed by using your Track ID. Also, if your Perfect Money account isn’t verified, your send fee will be 1.99 %

Done

When you finish the steps above, our team will immediately process your order and create your e-voucher. The process will take between 3 to 20 minutes. In the meantime, you can spend some time reading some of the latest crypto news on CoinCannon Blog. Remember that our support team is online 24/7 to answer all your questions.
